responses.label: Creates 10 random users, or the amount specified in the 'total' query param

responses.body:
{
  "uid": "{{urlParam 'uid'}}",
  "username": "{{ faker 'internet.userName' }}",
  "description": "{{ faker 'lorem.paragraph' 10 }}",
  "email": "{{ faker 'internet.email'  }}",
  "avatar": "{{ faker 'internet.avatar' }}",
  "city": "{{ faker 'address.city' }}",
  "fullname": "{{ firstName }} {{ lastName }}",
  "birthdate": "{{ faker 'date.past' 100 }}"
}

routes.documentation: Return an introduction to a specific book
Return a digest strip to a specific book
Return different tags according to type
Return an ID of a random Book

headers.value: Content-Type, Origin, Accept, Authorization, Content-Length, X-Requested-With
